bib.title: Named Entity Recognition in the Domain of Polish Stock Exchange Reports
bib.author: Marci{\'n}czuk, Micha{\l} and Piasecki, Maciej
bib.abstract: The paper investigates the accuracy of a Named Entity Recognition (NER) algorithm based on the Hidden Markov Model in the domain of Polish stock exchange reports. The task of NER was limited to the recognition and classification of Named Entities representing persons and companies. The algorithm was tested on a small Polish domain corpus of stock exchange reports. A comparison with the baselines of the algorithms based on the case of the first letters and a gazetteer is presented. The algorithm outperformed both baselines; it
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the 18th International Conference Intelligent Information Systems. Wydawnictwo Akademii Podlaskiej, Siedlce
